name: Space Treasure
description:
A challenging 2D side-scroller and platformer that will test your skill and will! Come prove yourself, prove that you have the willpower to beat this game! This game is designed to frustrate the player while entertaining them by presenting them a difficult challenge to overcome!

CONTROLS:

AWSD - Movement

Spacebar - Jump (hold space to jump higher)

Mouse Left Click - Shoot Missile

This game has a narrative which is still not implemented into the game, but it is explained in the video attached to this page. It contains 4 levels with an increasing level of difficulty as you go up each level. The 4th level is a boss fight. It also contains a 5th level which is an epilogue.
